name: Ancient Cave Dragon
description: The Ancient Cave Dragon is a gargantuan dragon with a robust physique, accented by spikes and a fearsome presence that looms in dark caverns.
memorable: Its darkness aura and ability to burrow make it a uniquely controlling presence in underground environments.
goals: To dominate its territory and instill fear in any who dare to intrude.
relations: Often found in lairs populated by lesser creatures it commands or subjects.
environment: Typically resides in deep caves and underground lairs.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and conditions such as being blinded or poisoned, alongside strong melee attacks.
weaknesses: Below-average dexterity limits its agility in combat.
attacks: Utilizes a devastating multiattack that includes a bite with piercing and poison damage, slashing with claws, and a heavy tail strike.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath allows it to inflict both immediate and ongoing harm, potentially poisoning multiple targets at once.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and tremorsense up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect threats effectively even without sight.
skills: Excels in perception with a +19 bonus, making it highly aware of hidden dangers.
additional_information: Can emit a magical darkness aura that obscures vision and dispels light spells.
Has legendary resistance, enabling it to ignore failed saving throws.
Can move unhindered through earth and stone, creating tactical advantages underground.
Features a reactive ability that punishes close intruders with piercing damage.
Can use legendary actions to maintain control of the battlefield.
